name: Temple of Neon
description:
A quick 1 bit ish platformer, made for the Amaze Me Game Jam 2021

Use your neon-powered torch to explore a hostile jungle temple and fulfill your fathers wishes from beyond the grave. like Indiana Jones mixed with Las Vegas... maybe

~ Controls ~

wasd - walk
space - jump
left mouse (hold) - use torch
r - restart room
t - restart at last checkpoint
